Body:
filepaths = [os.path.join(records_dir, 'circular_record.gb'), os.path.join(
    records_dir, 'example_sequences.fa')]
records = biotools.load_records_from_files(files=filepaths,
    use_file_names_as_ids=False)
assert sorted([r.id.lower() for r in records]) == ['bba_e0040_gfp',
    'expected_construct', 'frag_0', 'frag_1', 'frag_2']
records = biotools.load_records_from_files(files=filepaths,
    use_file_names_as_ids=True)
assert sorted([r.id.lower() for r in records]) == ['circular_record',
    'expected_construct', 'frag_0', 'frag_1', 'frag_2']
